description:
This is that hoody you’ll always reach for when you step outside. Made from responsibly-sourced Merino wool – known for natural temperature regulation and odour resistance — the Ionia provides comfort across a range of conditions and is wrapped around a nylon core for durability. The hood’s structured brim extends coverage, thumb loops hold the sleeves in place, and articulated patterning frees you to move down the trail without restriction.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
name: Arcteryx Ionia Merino Wool Hoody - Mens
